publications.title: Information Gardening
publications.abstract: This paper explores how humans conceptualize AI systems and proposes design principles for more intuitive AI interfaces based on cognitive mental models.

publications.title: Levels of Digital Doubles: A Dual Framework of Technological Capabilities and Human Implications
publications.abstract: We investigate methods for making AI reasoning processes more transparent and interpretable to end users, focusing on large language model architectures.

publications.title: Listen & Observe: LLM-RS Hybrid for Attitudinal and Behavioural Understanding
publications.abstract: We propose a novel framework for aligning AI systems with individual user values while maintaining broader safety constraints. Our approach combines fine-tuning techniques with personal preference modeling.
